name: Lightsaber: Great Legends of The Force
name_original: Lightsaber: Great Legends of The Force
description:
Dark side or light side?
To be the Jedi or Sith, one should own the lightsaber,
but you can own all of them in this single app!

Choose and swing your favorite saber!
Lightsabers of all the famous heroes and villains are here.

Features:
◆ On the first start you take test to find your side you belong to
◆ ALL famous lightsabers, with names of their owners
◆ Advanced sound system
◆ Original, detailed design of each lightsaber / hilt
◆ Vibration feedback on swing
◆ Lightsaber App can be used as a flashlight too
